duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in managing the company's social media accounts

Coordinate, plan, prepare, format, proofread, and revise proposals and statements of qualifications, as well as other marketing materials including resumes, cover letters, brochures, flyers, press releases, announcements, newsletters, and presentations
Assist in developing content and updates for the company website
Participate in the creation of new marketing strategies to help build and grow brand awareness
Assist with planning company meetings, events, gatherings, and celebrations
Work effectively with team members across various geographies

education_certification.credential: Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing or Communications
